name: Yoga
description: Improve flexibility, strength, and relaxation through a series of poses and controlled breathing.

name: Kickboxing
description: Cardiovascular and strength training through martial arts-inspired moves.

name: HIIT (High-Intensity Interval Training)
description: Short bursts of intense exercise alternated with periods of rest for efficient calorie burning and improved cardiovascular health.

name: Pilates
description: Focus on core strength, flexibility, and overall body awareness.

name: Zumba
description: Dance-based workout with energetic music to improve cardiovascular fitness.

name: Cycling
description: Indoor cycling class for a high-intensity cardiovascular workout.

name: Strength Training
description: Build muscle and increase overall strength with a variety of resistance exercises.

name: Yogalates
description: Combine elements of yoga and Pilates for a balanced workout.

name: Boxing Fitness
description: Full-body workout incorporating boxing techniques and conditioning drills.

name: Dance Cardio
description: Fun and energetic dance routines to boost cardiovascular health.

name: Functional Training
description: Focus on functional movements to improve everyday activities and overall fitness.

name: Mindful Stretch
description: Gentle stretching and mindfulness exercises for relaxation and flexibility.
